Reviews.Content: arrived tired sleepy 430 am flying day front desk friendly quickly checked nice clean close beach eat block party night music food drinks check experience hotel value

Reviews.Content: actually nice price placed floor casinothe noise requested promptly changed lived radisson commitment guest happy post reviews ship dumps mid morning cant mid afternoon real hassle cater ship traffic set aside block arrivals restaurants block hotel enjoyed italian mexican air venues food blah hotel eatery happy hour bar stiff drinks wireless internet free able outside connection window lobby

Reviews.Title: “Good qualities outweigh bad.”
Reviews.Author: DRoachBlackRock
Reviews.Content: overall nice experience downside lobby casino little cramped location ashford ave walk crummy street reach subpar beach view located hotel consisted dumpster burger king plus decent restaurant sight lots walking distance friendly helpful staff nice suite incredible rate booked bottom hotels website decent pool gym roof

Reviews.Title: “Decent pre-cruise / after-cruise hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelBug8920
Reviews.Content: stayed night san juan radisson disembarked cruise ship arrived hotel lobby extremely busy customers majority coming cruise waiting hold bags check time waited 3040 mins bell boys bags extremely apologetic honest situation cant complain pouring outside coming shopping walking san juan day highly recommended checked super quick 2 complimentary drink vouchers casino floor immediately strange odor extremely odd look hallway strange feel walking run hotel hostel surprise huge especially coming cruise ship cabin 250 sq ft clean overall night stay recommend hotel especially board cruise disembarking night recommend staying closer san juan hotel located condado 15 cab ride closer airport

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Vfoote2
Reviews.Content: chose hotel based reviews choice nicely furnished clean overall maintenance bathroom excellent sleep bed nice considering previously contemplating purchasing ac continental breakfast plentiful fresh centrally located didnt rent car 3 days vacation sites clubs walking distance bus ride short taxi ride hotel parking rates cheap reason stay

Reviews.Title: “Don't deliver what they advertise”
Reviews.Author: aggieastrosfan
Reviews.Content: stayed night precruise night postcruise ambassador club precruise fine didnt sleep beds advertised online postcruise disaster luggage hotel doing sightseeing luggage hour keys didnt rekeyed door alarm clock blast 2 hours called hot water ran shower bathroom door stuck slammed shut safe didnt ice machine floor didnt refrigerator huge deal advertised inlaws called twice requesting batteries tv remote oh hallway hot uncomfortably hot precruise precruise 6th floor 622 post 8th floor noise clean

Reviews.Content: hotel located close beach block comfort bed die perks ambassador club wonderful free continental breakfast appetizers night nice trip puerto rico definitely love return stay hotel pleased
